import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; const translations = { pl: { title: "Twoja Stacja LPG", address: "Ulica Podhala≈Ñska 25, 44-335 Jastrzƒôbie-Zdr√≥j", lpgPrice: "Cena LPG na stacji", delivery: "Dostawa butli: +20 z≈Ç (zam√≥w telefonicznie)", addToCart: "Dodaj do koszyka", cart: "Koszyk", emptyCart: "Koszyk jest pusty", total: "Razem", orderData: "Dane zam√≥wienia", person: "Osoba prywatna", company: "Firma", name: "Imiƒô i nazwisko", phone: "Telefon", email: "E-mail", addressField: "Adres dostawy / odbioru", companyName: "Nazwa firmy", nip: "NIP", payment: "Forma p≈Çatno≈õci", sendOrder: "Wy≈õlij zam√≥wienie", orderInfo: "Zam√≥wienie zostanie przes≈Çane na e-mail obs≈Çugi. P≈Çatno≈õƒá zgodnie z wybranƒÖ opcjƒÖ.", paymentsTitle: "Formy p≈Çatno≈õci", payCash: "üíµ Got√≥wka ‚Äì w sklepie lub przy dostawie", payCard: "üí≥ Karta p≈Çatnicza ‚Äì przy odbiorze w sklepie", payBlik: "üì± BLIK ‚Äì w sklepie lub po wcze≈õniejszym ustaleniu z dostawcƒÖ", eta: "Czas realizacji", estimated: "Przewidywany czas" }, en: { title: "Your LPG Station", address: "Podhala≈Ñska Street 25, 44-335 Jastrzƒôbie-Zdr√≥j", lpgPrice: "LPG price at the station", delivery: "Gas bottle delivery: +20 PLN (order by phone)", addToCart: "Add to cart", cart: "Cart", emptyCart: "Cart is empty", total: "Total", orderData: "Order details", person: "Private person", company: "Company", name: "Full name", phone: "Phone", email: "E-mail", addressField: "Delivery / pickup address", companyName: "Company name", nip: "VAT number", payment: "Payment method", sendOrder: "Send order", orderInfo: "Order will be sent to our e-mail. Payment as chosen.", paymentsTitle: "Payment methods", payCash: "üíµ Cash ‚Äì in store or at delivery", payCard: "üí≥ Card ‚Äì in store", payBlik: "üì± BLIK ‚Äì in store or after agreement with delivery", eta: "ETA", estimated: "Estimated" } }; export default function App() { const [lang, setLang] = useState("pl"); const t = translations[lang]; const [cart, setCart] = useState([]); const [lpgPrice, setLpgPrice] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { fetch("/data.json") .then((res) => res.json()) .then((data) => setLpgPrice(data.lpgPrice)) .catch((err) => console.error("B≈ÇƒÖd wczytywania ceny LPG:", err)); }, []); const products = [ { id: 2, name: "Gaz w butli 11KG Propan-Butan", price: 75, desc: "Cena za wymianƒô lub nape≈Çnienie. Wymagana w≈Çasna butla.", image: "/butla-11kg.png" }, { id: 3, name: "Gaz w butli 10KG Propan-Butan", price: 85, desc: "Cena za wymianƒô lub nape≈Çnienie. Wymagana w≈Çasna butla.", image: "/butla-11kg.png" }, { id: 4, name: "Gaz w butli 8KG Propan-Butan", price: 62, desc: "Cena za wymianƒô lub nape≈Çnienie. Wymagana w≈Çasna butla.", image: "/butla-8kg.jpg" }, { id: 5, name: "Gaz w butli 5KG", price: 53, desc: "Cena za wymianƒô lub nape≈Çnienie. Wymagana w≈Çasna butla.", image: "/butla-5kg.jpg" }, { id: 6, name: "Gaz w butli 3KG", price: 45, desc: "Cena za wymianƒô lub nape≈Çnienie. Wymagana w≈Çasna butla.", image: "/butla-3kg.jpg" }, { id: 7, name: "Gaz w butli 2KG", price: 40, desc: "Cena za wymianƒô lub nape≈Çnienie. Wymagana w≈Çasna butla.", image: "/butla-2kg.jpg" }, { id: 8, name: "Gaz w butli 1KG", price: 27, desc: "Cena za wymianƒô lub nape≈Çnienie. Wymagana w≈Çasna butla.", image: "/butla-1kg.jpg" }, { id: 9, name: "Pojemnik 11KG", price: 260, desc: "Cena za pustƒÖ butlƒô (bez gazu).", image: "/butla-11kg.png" }, { id: 10, name: "Sodastream Wymiana", price: 15,desc: "Cena za wymianƒô butli Click On lub Twist On", image: "/SodaStream.jpg" }, { id: 11, name: "P≈Çyn do spryskiwaczy letni", price: 11, desc: "Opakowanie 5L. Zapach Zielonego Jab≈Çka.", image: "/P≈Çyn-lato.jpg" }, { id: 12, name: "P≈Çyn do spryskiwaczy zimowy", price: 22, desc: "Opakowanie 5L. Odporny na mr√≥z do -20 stopni. Zapach Cytrusowy", image: "/P≈Çyn-zima.jpg" }, ]; const addToCart = (product) => { setCart((prev) => { const found = prev.find((p) => p.id === product.id); if (found) { return prev.map((p) => p.id === product.id ? { ...p, quantity: p.quantity + 1 } : p ); } return [...prev, { ...product, quantity: 1 }]; }); }; const updateQuantity = (id, delta) => { setCart((prev) => prev .map((item) => item.id === id ? { ...item, quantity: Math.max(1, (item.quantity || 1) + delta) } : item ) .filter((i) => i.quantity > 0) ); }; const removeFromCart = (id) => { setCart((prev) => prev.filter((item) => item.id !== id)); }; const total = cart.reduce( (acc, item) => acc + Number(item.price) * Number(item.quantity || 1), 0 ); // Formularz const [customerType, setCustomerType] = useState("osoba"); // 'private' | 'company' const [form, setForm] = useState({ name: "", phone: "", email: "", address: "", companyName: "", nip: "", payment: "Cash in store", // domy≈õlna }); const handleForm = (e) => setForm((f) => ({ ...f, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })); const submitOrder = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); if (cart.length === 0) return alert(lang==="pl"? "Koszyk jest pusty":"Cart is empty"); const payload = { cart, total: Number(total.toFixed(2)), customerType, form, lang, }; try { const res = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/order", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(payload), }); if (!res.ok) throw new Error("send failed"); alert(lang==="pl" ? "Zam√≥wienie wys≈Çane!" : "Order sent!"); setCart([]); setCustomerType("private"); setForm({ name: "", phone: "", email: "", address: "", companyName: "", nip: "", payment: "Cash in store", }); } catch (err) { console.error(err); alert(lang==="pl"? "B≈ÇƒÖd przy wysy≈Çaniu zam√≥wienia" : "Error sending order"); } }; return (
